messages.content: મારા પ્લોટમાં પાણી ક્યારે આપવું
messages.en: When to water my plot
messages.standalone_question: When should I water my plot?
messages.content_transliterated: mara plotaman pani kyare apvu

messages.content:
મને માફ કરશો, પરંતુ હું તમારા પ્લોટ માટે પાણી આપવાની આગાહી કરી શકતો નથી કારણ કે મીઠા જમીનના ભેજના વાંચન મળ્યા નથી. 

જો તમે મીઠા જમીનના ભેજના વાંચન વિશે વધુ માહિતી આપી શકો છો, તો હું વધુ મદદ કરી શકું છું.
messages.en:
I'm sorry, but I can't predict watering for your plot because salt soil moisture readings haven't been found. 

If you can give more information about salt soil moisture readings, I can help more.
messages.content_transliterated:
mane maaf karsho, parantu hu tamara plot mate pani apavani agahi kari sakato nathi karan ke meetha jaminana bhejana vanchan malya nathi. 

jo tame meetha jaminana bhejana vanchan vishe vadhu mahiti aapi shako cho, to hu vadhu madad kari saku chu.

messages.content: મીઠા જમીનના ભેજના વાંચન વિશે મારે શું કરવું
messages.en: What do I do about salt soil moisture readings
messages.standalone_question: What should I do about the soil moisture readings?
messages.content_transliterated: mitha jaminana bhejana vanchan vishe mare shu karvu

messages.content:
મને માફ કરશો, પરંતુ હું તમારા પ્લોટ માટે મીઠા જમીનના ભેજના વાંચનો મેળવવા માટે કોઈ માહિતી મેળવી શક્યો નથી. 

કૃપા કરીને ખાતરી કરો કે સેન્સર યોગ્ય રીતે કાર્ય કરી રહ્યો છે. જો તમને વધુ મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને મને જણાવો.
messages.en:
I'm sorry, but I couldn't get any information to get the saltland moisture readings for your plot. 

Please make sure the sensor is working properly. If you need more help, please let me know.
messages.content_transliterated:
mane maaf karsho, parantu hu tamara plot mate meetha jaminana bhejana vancano melavava mate koi mahiti melavi sakyo nathi. 

krupa karine khatri karo ke sensor yogy rite kary kari rhayo che. jo tamne vadhu madadani jarur hoy, to krupa karine mane janavo.

initial_message: અબ બતાય ગ મારા ખેતરમાં પાણીની જરૂરિયાત છે આ નથી

messages.content: અબ બતાય ગ મારા ખેતરમાં પાણીની જરૂરિયાત છે આ નથી
messages.en: Now I need water in my field, this is not
messages.standalone_question: Is there a need for irrigation in my farm?
messages.content_transliterated: ab batay gajendra mara khetaraman panini jaruriyat che a nathi

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં પાણીની જરૂરિયાત છે. 

**ખેતરનું નામ:** Rameshbhai's plot  
**મૂળભૂત ભેજ:** 69%  
**આપ્ટિમલ ભેજ:** 70%  

તેથી, તમે પાણી આપી શકો છો, કારણ કે ભેજનું પ્રમાણ આપ્ટિમલથી નીચે છે.
messages.en:
Your field needs water. 

**Name of the Farm:** Rameshbhai's plot  
**Basic humidity:** 69%  
**Optimal humidity:** 70%  

So, you can water it, as the humidity level is below optimal.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara khetaraman panini jaruriyat che. 

**khetaranun nam:** Rameshbhai's plot  
**mulabhut bhej:** 69%  
**optimal bhej:** 70%  

tethi, tame pani aapi shako cho, karan ke bhejanun praman optimalthy nice che.

messages.content: મારી આગળી સ્ટેજ મે શું ખાતર આપવાનો પહેલા અઠવાડિિયામાં
messages.en: My next stage is what I need to fertilize in the first week.
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I apply in the first week of my next stage?
messages.content_transliterated: mari agali stage may shun khatar apavano pela athavadiyaman

messages.content:
આગળની સ્ટેજમાં (Vegetative Growth) પહેલા અઠવાડિયામાં આપને નીચે મુજબના ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર છે:

**ખેતરનું નામ:** Rameshbhai's plot

1. **પ્રથમ દિવસ:**
   - **Humic acid:** 1 લિટર/એકર

2. **ચોથા દિવસ:**
   - **12-61-0:** 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Urea:** 7 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **24-24-0:** 16 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Urea:** 8.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 4.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

આ ખાતરો આપના પાકના વિકાસ માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.
messages.en:
In the first week of the next stage (vegetative growth), you need to apply the following fertilizers:

**Name of the Farm:** Rameshbhai's plot

1. **First day:**
   - **Humic acid:** 1 liter/acre

2. **Day 4:**
   - **12-61-0:** 6 kg/acre
   - **Urea:** 7 kg/acre
   - **24-24-0:** 16 kg/acre
   - **Urea:** 8.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 4.5 kg/acre

These fertilizers are important for the growth of your crops.
messages.content_transliterated:
agalani stejaman (Vegetative Growth) pela athavadiyaman aapne nice mujabana khatar apavani jarur che:

**khetaranun nam:** Rameshbhai's plot

1. **pratham divas:**
   - **Humic acid:** 1 litre/acre

2. **chotha divas:**
   - **12-61-0:** 6 kilogram/acre
   - **Urea:** 7 kilogram/acre
   - **24-24-0:** 16 kilogram/acre
   - **Urea:** 8.5 kilogram/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 4.5 kilogram/acre

a khataro aapna pakana vikas mate mahatvapurn che.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकाला पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही. येथे प्रत्येक प्लॉटसाठी तपशील आहेत:

1. **Plot no 2 SSN**:
   - **मातीची आर्द्रता**: 94% (आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त)
   - **पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही.**

2. **sudhakar plot no 2**:
   - **प्लॉट रिचार्ज कालावधी संपला आहे**, कृपया डेटा पाहण्यासाठी रिचार्ज करा.

3. **Sudhakar plot no 1**:
   - **मातीची आर्द्रता**: 17 kPa (आवश्यकतेपेक्षा कमी)
   - **पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही.**

4. **Sudhakar k 1**:
   - **मातीची आर्द्रता**: 6 kPa (आवश्यकतेपेक्षा कमी)
   - **पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही.**

### फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
- **Plot no 2 SSN**:
  - **सध्याचा टप्पा**: फळ सेट (Fruit Set)
  - **फर्टिगेशन**: 
    - **फोलिअर पद्धती**: 
      - **फेरस सल्फेट**: 800 gm/एकर
      - **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट**: 800 gm/एकर
    - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धती**:
      - **11-44-11**: 5.5 kg/एकर
      - **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश**: 3.5 kg/एकर
      - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट**: 1.5 kg/एकर

- **Sudhakar plot no 2**: डेटा उपलब्ध नाही.

- **Sudhakar plot no 1**:
  - **सध्याचा टप्पा**: शूट विकास (Shoot Development)
  - **फर्टिगेशन**: 
    - **जिंक ऑक्साइड**: 200 gm/एकर
    - **गिब्बेरलिक अॅसिड (GA3)**: 10 ppm/प्लांट

- **Sudhakar k 1**:
  - **सध्याचा टप्पा**: बेरी विकास (Berry Development)
  - **फर्टिगेशन**: 
    - **गिब्बेरलिक अॅसिड (GA3)**: 20 ppm/प्लांट
    - **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/प्लांट

### रोग आणि कीटक नियंत्रण:
- **Sudhakar k 1**: 
  - **पावसाळी बुरशी** (Powdery mildew) साठी स्प्रे करणे आवश्यक आहे. 
  - **सुझवलेले स्प्रे**: 
    - **Metrafenone**: 100 ml
    - **Difenoconazole**: 200 ml

कृपया तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी आवश्यक क्रियाकलापांची योजना करा.
messages.en:
It is not necessary to water your crop. Here are the details for each plot:

1. **Plot no 2 SSN**:
   - **Soil Humidity**: 94% (more than required)
   - **Watering is not required.**

2. **sudhakar plot no 2**:
   - **Plot recharge period is over**, please recharge to see the data.

3. **Sudhakar plot no 1**:
   - **Soil Humidity**: 17 kPa (less than required)
   - **Watering is not required.**

4. **Sudhakar k 1**:
   - **Soil Humidity**: 6 kPa (less than required)
   - **Watering is not required.**

### Fertigation Schedule:
- **Plot no 2 SSN**:
  - **Current Phase**: Fruit Set
  - **Fertigation**: 
    - **Foliar method**: 
      - **Ferrous sulfate**: 800 gm/acre
      - **Manganese sulfate**: 800 gm/acre
    - **Fertigation Method**:
      - **11-44-11**: 5.5 kg/acre
      - **Sulfate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/acre
      - **Magnesium Sulfate**: 1.5 kg/acre

- **Sudhakar plot no 2**: Data not available.

- **Sudhakar plot no 1**:
  - **Current Phase**: Shoot Development
  - **Fertigation**: 
    - **Zinc oxide**: 200 gm/acre
    - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 10 ppm/plant

- **Sudhakar k 1**:
  - **Current Phase**: Berry Development
  - **Fertigation**: 
    - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 20 ppm/plant
    - **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/plant

### Disease and Pest Control:
- **Sudhakar k 1**: 
  - Spraying is necessary for **rainy mildew**. 
  - **Suggested Spray**: 
    - **Metrafenone**: 100 ml
    - **Difenoconazole**: 200 ml

Please plan the activities required for your plot.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya picala paani dene aavashyak nahi. yethe pratyek platsathi tapshil aahet:

1. **Plot no 2 SSN**:
   - **matichi aardrata**: 94% (avashyaktepeksha jast)
   - **paani dene aavashyak nahi.**

2. **sudhakar plot no 2**:
   - **plot recharge kalavadhi sampla aahe**, kripya data pahanyasathi recharge kara.

3. **Sudhakar plot no 1**:
   - **matichi aardrata**: 17 kPa (avashyaktepeksha kami)
   - **paani dene aavashyak nahi.**

4. **Sudhakar k 1**:
   - **matichi aardrata**: 6 kPa (avashyaktepeksha kami)
   - **paani dene aavashyak nahi.**

### fertigation schedule:
- **Plot no 2 SSN**:
  - **sadhyacha tappa**: fal set (Fruit Set)
  - **fertigation**: 
    - **follier paddhati**: 
      - **ferrous sulphate**: 800 gm/acre
      - **manganese sulfate**: 800 gm/acre
    - **fertigation paddhati**:
      - **11-44-11**: 5.5 kg/acre
      - **salfette of potash**: 3.5 kg/acre
      - **magnesium sulfate**: 1.5 kg/acre

- **Sudhakar plot no 2**: data uplabdh nahi.

- **Sudhakar plot no 1**:
  - **sadhyacha tappa**: shoot vikas (Shoot Development)
  - **fertigation**: 
    - **jink oxide**: 200 gm/acre
    - **gibberlik acid (GA3)**: 10 ppm/plant

- **Sudhakar k 1**:
  - **sadhyacha tappa**: berry vikas (Berry Development)
  - **fertigation**:

    - **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/plant

### rog aani keetak niyantran:
- **Sudhakar k 1**: 
  - **pavasali burshi** (Powdery mildew) sathi spray karne avashyak ahe.

initial_message: હવે હું મારા બટાકામાં કયું ખાતર આપું

messages.content: હવે હું મારા બટાકામાં કયું ખાતર આપું
messages.en: Now what fertilizer should I put in my potato?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I apply to my potatoes?
messages.content_transliterated: have hu mara batakaman kayu khatar apu

messages.content:
હવે તમારા બટાકા (હાયફન) માટે ફર્ટિગેશનની જરૂર નથી. તમે આગામી સપ્તાહમાં (2025-12-02) શરૂ થનારી વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ સ્ટેજમાં ફર્ટિગેશન કરી શકો છો. 

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
1. **સપ્તાહ 1, દિવસ 1**:
   - **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર**: હ્યુમિક એસિડ (1 લિટર/એકર)
   - **નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

2. **સપ્તાહ 1, દિવસ 4**:
   - **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર વિકલ્પો**:
     - 12-61-0 (6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર) + યુરિયા (7 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર)
     - 24-24-0 (16 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર)
     - યુરિયા (8.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર) + ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80% (4.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર)
   - **નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતીની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને પૂછો!
messages.en:
Now you don't need fertigation for your potato (hyphen). You can fertigize in the vegetative growth stage starting next week (2025-12-02). 

### Upcoming fertigation schedule:
1. **Week 1, Day 1**:
   - **Fertilizer**: Humic acid (1 litre/acre)
   **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

2. **Week 1, Day 4**:
   - **Fertilizer Options**:
     - 12-61-0 (6 kg/acre) + urea (7 kg/acre)
     - 24-24-0 (16 kg/acre)
     - Urea (8.5 kg/acre) + phosphoric acid 80% (4.5 kg/acre)
   **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

If you need more information, please ask!
messages.content_transliterated:
have tamara bataka (hyphen) mate fartigeshanani jarur nathi. tame agami saptahaman (2025-12-02) sharu thanari vegetative growth stejaman fertigation kari shako cho. 

### agami fertigation schedule:
1. **saptah 1, divas 1**:
   - **fertilizer**: humic acid (1 litre/acre)
   - **nondh**: phosphoric esidane any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

2. **saptah 1, divas 4**:
   - **fertilizer vikalpo**:
     - 12-61-0 (6 kilogram/acre) + yuriya (7 kilogram/acre)
     - 24-24-0 (16 kilogram/acre)
     - yuriya (8.5 kilogram/acre) + phosphoric acid 80% (4.5 kilogram/acre)
   - **nondh**: phosphoric esidane any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

jo tamne vadhu mahitini jarur hoy, to krupa karine puchho!

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, જે હાલની તબક્કામાં છે (Vegetative growth), નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરવાની ભલામણ કરવામાં આવે છે:

### હાલની સપ્તાહ (સપ્તાહ 1):
1. **આજે (25 નવેમ્બર 2025)**:
   - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ**: 1 લિટર/એકર

2. **4 દિવસ પછી (29 નવેમ્બર 2025)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **યુરિયા**: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - અથવા
   - **24-24-0**: 16 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - અથવા
   - **યુરિયા**: 7.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### આગામી સપ્તાહ (સપ્તાહ 2):
- **1 દિવસ પછી (18 જાન્યુઆરી 2026)**:
   - **યુરિયા**: 10 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

- **4 દિવસ પછી (21 જાન્યુઆરી 2026)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ**: 7.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - અથવા
   - **24-24-0**: 9.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%**: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### નોંધ:
- ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશનથી 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

આ ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ તમારા પાકના વિકાસને પ્રોત્સાહન આપશે.
messages.en:
For your crop, which is in the current stage (vegetative growth), it is recommended to use the following fertilizers:

### Current week (Week 1):
1. **Today (25 November 2025)**:
   - **Humic Acid**: 1 liter/acre

2. **4 days later (29 November 2025)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 6 kg/acre
   -or
   - **24-24-0**: 16 kg/acre
   -or
   - **Urea**: 7.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 5 kg/acre

### Next week (Week 2):
- **1 day later (18 January 2026)**:
   - **Urea**: 10 kg/acre

- **4 days later (21 January 2026)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 kg/acre
   - **Ammonium Sulfate**: 7.5 kg/acre
   - **Magnesium Sulfate**: 5 kg/acre
   -or
   - **24-24-0**: 9.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric Acid 80%****: 2 kg/acre
   - **Magnesium Sulfate**: 5 kg/acre

### Note:
- Phosphoric Acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

The use of these fertilizers will promote the growth of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, jay halani tabakkaman che (Vegetative growth), nicena khatarono upayog karvani bhalaman karavaman ave che:

### halani saptah (saptah 1):
1. **aje (25 november 2025)**:
   - **humic acid**: 1 litre/acre

2. **4 divas pachi (29 november 2025)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 kilogram/acre
   - **yuriya**: 6 kilogram/acre
   - athava
   - **24-24-0**: 16 kilogram/acre
   - athava
   - **yuriya**: 7.5 kilogram/acre
   - **phosphoric acid 80%**: 5 kilogram/acre

### agami saptah (saptah 2):
- **1 divas pachi (18 january 2026)**:
   - **yuriya**: 10 kilogram/acre

- **4 divas pachi (21 january 2026)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 kilogram/acre
   - **ammonium sulfate**: 7.5 kilogram/acre
   - **magnesium sulfate**: 5 kilogram/acre
   - athava
   - **24-24-0**: 9.5 kilogram/acre
   - **phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kilogram/acre
   - **magnesium sulfate**: 5 kilogram/acre

### nondh:
- phosphoric esidane any khataroni eplikeshanathi 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

a khatarono upayog tamara pakana vikasane protsahan aapse.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Vangi plot 1" मध्ये सध्या पाण्याची गरज नाही. 

- **मातीची आर्द्रता**: 4 kPa (पहिला सेंसर), 0 kPa (दुसरा सेंसर)
- **आवश्यक आर्द्रता**: 22 kPa

सध्या मातीची आर्द्रता कमी आहे, त्यामुळे पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.
messages.en:
Your "Vangi plot 1" does not require water at the moment. 

- **Soil Humidity**: 4 kPa (first sensor), 0 kPa (second sensor)
- **Humidity Required**: 22 kPa

At present, the soil moisture is low, so there is no need to water.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Vangi plot 1" madhye sadhya panyachi garaj nahi. 

- **matichi aardrata**: 4 kPa (pahila sensor), 0 kPa (dusra sensor)
- **aavashyak aardrata**: 22 kPa

sadhya matichi aardrata kami aahe, tyamule pani denyachi aavashyakta nahi.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खत वापरण्याची शेड्यूल खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### Sudhakar प्लॉट:
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** फळ सेट (Fruit Set)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 2
- **सध्याची शेड्यूल:** कोणतेही खत आवश्यक नाही.

#### पुढील शेड्यूल:
1. **आवस्था:** बेरी विकास (Berry Development)
   - **आठवडा:** 1
   - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:** 
     - Gibberallic acid (GA3): 20 ppm/plant
     - CPPU (0.1%): 1 ppm/plant
     - Zinc Oxide: 200 gm/acre
   - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
     - 11-44-11: 6.5 kg/acre
     - Calcium nitrate: 1.5 kg/acre
     - Sulfate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre
     - Magnesium Sulphate: 1.5 kg/acre
   - **सुरुवात तारीख:** 2025-12-01

### Thompson प्लॉट:
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** फळ सेट (Fruit Set)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 1
- **सध्याची शेड्यूल:** 
   - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:** 
     - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
     - Manganese Sulphate: 600 gm/acre

#### पुढील शेड्यूल:
1. **आवस्था:** बेरी विकास (Berry Development)
   - **आठवडा:** 1
   - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:** 
     - Gibberallic acid (GA3): 20 ppm/plant
     - CPPU (0.1%): 1 ppm/plant
     - Zinc Oxide: 200 gm/acre
   - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
     - 11-44-11: 6.5 kg/acre
     - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
     - Sulfate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre
     - Magnesium Sulphate: 1.5 kg/acre
   - **सुरुवात तारीख:** 2025-12-07

तुम्हाला या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल.
messages.en:
The following is the schedule for using fertilizer for your crop (grapes):

### Sudhakar Plot:
- **Current Status:** Fruit Set
- **Current Week:** 2
- **Current Schedule:** No fertilizer required.

#### Next Schedule:
1. **Stage:** Berry Development
   - **Week:** 1
   - **Foliar Method:** 
     - Gibberallic acid (GA3): 20 ppm/plant
     - CPPU (0.1%): 1 ppm/plant
     - Zinc Oxide: 200 gm/acre
   - **Fertigation Method:**
     - 11-44-11: 6.5 kg/acre
     - Calcium nitrate: 1.5 kg/acre
     - Sulfate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre
     - Magnesium Sulphate: 1.5 kg/acre
   - **Start Date:** 2025-12-01

### Thompson Plot:
- **Current Status:** Fruit Set
- **Current Week:** 1
- **Current Schedule:** 
   - **Foliar Method:** 
     - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
     - Manganese Sulphate: 600 gm/acre

#### Next Schedule:
1. **Stage:** Berry Development
   - **Week:** 1
   - **Foliar Method:** 
     - Gibberallic acid (GA3): 20 ppm/plant
     - CPPU (0.1%): 1 ppm/plant
     - Zinc Oxide: 200 gm/acre
   - **Fertigation Method:**
     - 11-44-11: 6.5 kg/acre
     - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
     - Sulfate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre
     - Magnesium Sulphate: 1.5 kg/acre
   - **Start Date:** 2025-12-07

You will have to use fertilizers according to this schedule.

- **sadhyachi schedule:** kontehi khat aavashyak nahi.

#### pudhil schedule:
1. **aavastha:** berry vikas (Berry Development)
   - **athavada:** 1
   - **follier paddhatine:** 
     - Gibberallic acid (GA3): 20 ppm/plant
     - CPPU (0.1%): 1 ppm/plant
     - Zinc Oxide: 200 gm/acre
   - **fertigation paddhatine:**
     - 11-44-11: 6.5 kg/acre
     - Calcium nitrate: 1.5 kg/acre
     - Sulfate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre
     - Magnesium Sulphate: 1.5 kg/acre
   - **suruvat tarikh:** 2025-12-01

### Thompson plot:
- **sadhyachi avastha:** fal set (Fruit Set)
- **sadhyacha athavada:** 1

initial_message: મારા આ પેદરમાં પાણીની પીછ જેવું છે

messages.content: મારા આ પેદરમાં પાણીની પીછ જેવું છે
messages.en: My pedal is like a feather of water
messages.standalone_question: Is there a water logging issue in my plant?
messages.content_transliterated: mara a pedaraman panini pich jevu che

messages.content: તમારા પેદરમાં પાણીની પીછ જેવું છે, તો આનો અર્થ છે કે જમીનનું પાણીનું સ્તર વધુ છે. જો તમે વધુ ચોક્કસ માહિતી મેળવવા માંગતા હો, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો કે તમે કઈ રીતે મદદ કરી શકું?
messages.en: If your pedal is like a water feather, this means that the water level in the ground is high. If you would like more specific information, please let us know how you can help?
messages.content_transliterated: tamara pedaraman panini pich jevu che, to ano earth che ke jaminanun paninun star vadhu che. jo tame vadhu chokkas mahiti melavava mangata ho, to krupa karine janavo ke tame kai rite madad kari saku?

messages.content: મારા ક્ષેત્રમાં પાણીની કેટલી જરૂર છે
messages.en: How much water is needed in my area
messages.standalone_question: What is the required amount of water for my field?
messages.content_transliterated: mara kshetraman panini ketli jarur che

messages.content:
તમારા "બજજી" ક્ષેત્રમાં હાલ 100% જમીનનું પાણીનું સ્તર છે, જ્યારે આ માટેનું આદર્શ સ્તર 70% છે. તેથી, હાલમાં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે જમીનનું પાણીનું સ્તર યોગ્ય છે. 

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો!
messages.en:
Your "Bujji" area currently has 100% ground water level, while the ideal level is 70%. Therefore, there is no need to water at present, as the water level of the soil is right. 

Please let me know if you need more information!
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara "bajaji" kshetraman hal 100% jaminanun paninun star che, jyaare a matenun adarsh star 70% che. tethi, halaman pani apavani jarur nathi, karan ke jaminanun paninun star yogy che. 

jo tamne vadhu mahiti joie to krupa karine janavo!

messages.content: મારા ખેતરમાં ખાતરની જરૂર છે કે નથી
messages.en: Does my field need manure or not
messages.standalone_question: Is there a need for fertilizer in my field?
messages.content_transliterated: mara khetaraman khatarani jarur che ke nathi

messages.content:
તમારા "બજજી" ખેતરમાં હાલ ખાતરની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે હાલમાં (25 નવેમ્બર 2025) ખાતર આપવાની કોઈ જરૂર નથી. 

આગામી તબક્કામાં, "વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ" (Vegetative Growth) તબક્કામાં, 10 ડિસેમ્બર 2025થી ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર પડશે. 

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો!
messages.en:
There is no need for fertilizer in your "bajji" field right now, as there is currently no need to fertilize (25 November 2025). 

In the next phase, in the "Vegetative Growth" phase, fertilizer application will be required from 10th December 2025. 

Please let me know if you need more information!
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara "bajaji" khetaraman hal khatarani jarur nathi, karan ke halaman (25 november 2025) khatar apavani koi jarur nathi. 

agami tabakkaman, "vegetative growth" (Vegetative Growth) tabakkaman, 10 december 2025thi khatar apavani jarur padse. 

jo tamne vadhu mahiti joie to krupa karine janavo!

initial_message: હું આ પ્લોટમાં પાણી ક્યારે વાળું

messages.content: હું આ પ્લોટમાં પાણી ક્યારે વાળું
messages.en: When should I divert water to this plot?
messages.standalone_question: When should I water this plot?
messages.content_transliterated: hu a plotaman pani kyare varu

messages.content:
તમારા પ્લોટ માટે પાણી ક્યારે વાળવું તે જાણવા માટેની માહિતી ઉપલબ્ધ નથી:

1. **Maheshbhai's plot**: તમારા પ્લોટનું રિચાર્જ સમાપ્ત થઈ ગયું છે, કૃપા કરીને ડેટા જોવા માટે રિચાર્જ કરો.
2. **santana**: જીવંત ડેટા ઉપલબ્ધ નથી, તેથી પાણીની સ્થિતિ ચકાસી શકાતી નથી.

કૃપા કરીને રિચાર્જ કરો અથવા વધુ માહિતી માટે સંપર્ક કરો.
messages.en:
Information is not available to know when to divert water for your plot:

1. **Maheshbhai's plot**: The recharge of your plot has been completed, please recharge to view the data.
2. **santana**: Live data is not available, so the water condition cannot be checked.

Please recharge or contact for more information.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara plot mate pani kyare valavun te janava mateni mahiti upalabdh nathi:

1. **Maheshbhai's plot**: tamara plotanun recharge samapt thai gayu che, krupa karine data jova mate recharge karo.
2. **santana**: jivant data upalabdh nathi, tethi panini sthiti chakasi shakati nathi.

krupa karine recharge karo athava vadhu mahiti mate sampark karo.

messages.content: મારે આ પ્લોટમાં પાણી ક્યારે વાળવું
messages.en: When should I divert water to this plot
messages.standalone_question: When should I water this plot?
messages.content_transliterated: mare a plotaman pani kyare valavun

messages.content:
**Maheshbhai's plot**: તમારા પ્લોટનું રિચાર્જ સમાપ્ત થઈ ગયું છે, કૃપા કરીને ડેટા જોવા માટે રિચાર્જ કરો.

**santana**: હાલના સમયે પાણીની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે જમીનનું આर्द્રતા 90% છે, જે 70% ના ઓપ્ટિમલ મોઇશ્ચરથી વધુ છે.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો!
messages.en:
**Maheshbhai's plot**: The recharge of your plot has been completed, please recharge to view the data.

**santana**: Water is not needed at the moment, as the soil moisture is 90%, which is more than the optimal moisture of 70%.

Please let me know if you need more information!
messages.content_transliterated:
**Maheshbhai's plot**: tamara plotanun recharge samapt thai gayu che, krupa karine data jova mate recharge karo.

**santana**: halana samaye panini jarur nathi, karan ke jaminanun aर्दrata 90% che, jay 70% na optimal moishcarathi vadhu che.

jo tamne vadhu mahiti joie to krupa karine janavo!

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Super plot" मध्ये, सध्या तुम्ही "Beginning of Bloom" या अवस्थेत आहात, जी 2025-11-16 पासून सुरू झाली आहे. या अवस्थेत, तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करण्याची शिफारस केली जाते:

### सध्याची फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 2):
1. **फर्टिलायझर**:
   - **11-44-11**: 8 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर

   **टीप**: 
   - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल वेगळा लागू करावा, इतर खतांच्या 15-20 मिनिटे आधी.
   - कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट वेगळा लागू करावा, इतर खतांच्या 15-20 मिनिटे नंतर.

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (फळ सेट):
- **फळ सेट** (सप्ताह 1) - 2025-12-07 पासून सुरू होईल.
   - **फर्टिलायझर**:
     - **11-44-11**: 8 किलोग्राम/एकर
     - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
     - **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
     - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट**: 980 ग्रॅम/एकर

   **टीप**: 
   - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल वेगळा लागू करावा, इतर खतांच्या 15-20 मिनिटे आधी.
   - कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट वेगळा लागू करावा, इतर खतांच्या 15-20 मिनिटे नंतर.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या योग्य वाढीसाठी या खतांचा वापर करा.
messages.en:
In your "Super Plot", you are currently in the "Beginning of Bloom" stage, which has started from 2025-11-16. At this stage, you are recommended to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
1. **Fertilizer**:
   - **11-44-11**: 8 kg/acre
   - **Calcium Nitrate**: 2 kg/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 1 kg/acre

**Note**: 
   Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers.
   Calcium nitrate should be applied separately, 15–20 minutes after other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Fruit Set):
- **Fruit Set** (Week 1) - Starting from 2025-12-07.
   - **Fertilizer**:
     - **11-44-11**: 8 kg/acre
     - **Calcium Nitrate**: 2 kg/acre
     - **Sulfate of Potash**: 1 kg/acre
     - **Magnesium sulfate**: 980 g/acre

**Note**: 
   Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers.
   Calcium nitrate should be applied separately, 15–20 minutes after other fertilizers.

Use these fertilizers for proper growth of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Super plot" madhye, sadhya tumhi "Beginning of Bloom" ya avasthet ahat, g 2025-11-16 pasun suru jhali aahe. ya avasthet, tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karanyachi shipharas kelley jate:

### sadhyachi fertigation schedule (saptah 2):
1. **fertilizer**:
   - **11-44-11**: 8 kilogram/acre
   - **calcium nitrate**: 2 kilogram/acre
   - **salphet of potash**: 1 kilogram/acre

**tip**: 
   - phosphoric aml vegala lagu karava, itar khatanchya 15-20 minute aadhi.
   - calcium nitrate vegala lagu karava, itar khatanchya 15-20 minute nantar.

### pudhil fertigation schedule (phal set):
- **phal set** (saptah 1) - 2025-12-07 pasun suru hoil.
   - **fertilizer**:
     - **11-44-11**: 8 kilogram/acre
     - **calcium nitrate**: 2 kilogram/acre
     - **salphet of potash**: 1 kilogram/acre
     - **magnesium sulphate**: 980 gram/acre

**tip**: 
   - phosphoric aml vegala lagu karava, itar khatanchya 15-20 minute aadhi.
   - calcium nitrate vegala lagu karava, itar khatanchya 15-20 minute nantar.

tumachya pikachya yogy vadhisathi ya khatancha vapar kara.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Super plot no 1" मध्ये सध्या पाण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

- **मातीची आर्द्रता**: 100% (खूप ओलसर)
- **आवश्यक आर्द्रता**: 60% 

सध्या पाण्याची गरज नाही, कारण मातीची आर्द्रता आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त आहे.
messages.en:
Your "Super plot no 1" does not require water at present. 

- **Soil Humidity**: 100% (very moist)
- **Required humidity**: 60% 

At present, there is no need for water, as the soil moisture is more than necessary.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Super plot no 1" madhye sadhya panyachi aavashyakta nahi. 

- **matichi aardrata**: 100% (khoop olsar)
- **aavashyak aardrata**: 60% 

sadhya panyachi garaj nahi, karan matichi aardrata avashyaktepeksha jast ahe.

initial_message: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?

messages.content: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?
messages.en: Should I water my crops?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: shu mane mari pakane pani apvu joie?

messages.content:
હા, તમને તમારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ. 

**ખાડિયો પ્લોટ** માટે:
- વર્તમાન જમીનનું ભેજ: 52%
- આદર્શ જમીનનું ભેજ: 80%

જમીનનું ભેજ આદર્શ સ્તરથી નીચે છે, તેથી પાણી આપવું યોગ્ય છે.
messages.en:
Yes, you should water your crops. 

For the **Khadiya plot**:
- Current soil moisture: 52%
- Ideal soil moisture: 80%

The soil moisture is below the ideal level, so watering is appropriate.
messages.content_transliterated:
ha, tamne tamari pakane pani apvu joie. 

**khadiyo plot** mate:
- vartaman jaminanun bhej: 52%
- adarsh jaminanun bhej: 80%

jaminanun bhej adarsh starathi nice che, tethi pani apvu yogy che.

initial_message: My soil moisture sensor 2 is 42 kpa, how many day will it take to reach 100 in current conditions

messages.content: My soil moisture sensor 2 is 42 kpa, how many day will it take to reach 100 in current conditions
messages.en: My soil moisture sensor 2 is 42 kpa, how many day will it take to reach 100 in current conditions
messages.standalone_question: How many days will it take for my soil moisture sensor 2, currently at 42 kPa, to reach 100 kPa under the current conditions?

messages.content:
A soil moisture reading of 42 kPa indicates that the soil is relatively moist. To provide an accurate forecast of how many days it will take to reach 100 kPa (which indicates drier soil), I need to check the current soil moisture trends and conditions.

Let me gather the necessary data to provide you with a forecast.:

Based on the recent soil moisture data for your plot "pomo palace":

- On November 24, the soil moisture sensor 2 was at 39 kPa.
- On November 23, it was at 36 kPa.
- On November 22, it was at 34 kPa.
- On November 21, it was at 34 kPa.
- On November 20, it was at 33 kPa.

The soil moisture levels have been gradually increasing, indicating that the soil is becoming wetter. Given that the current reading is 42 kPa, it is likely that the soil will remain moist for some time.

To estimate how long it will take to reach 100 kPa, we need to consider the drying rate, which can vary based on weather conditions, temperature, and other factors. However, based on the recent trend, it appears that the soil moisture is not drying out quickly.

If the current conditions continue, it may take several days to reach 100 kPa. However, without specific drying rate data, it's challenging to provide an exact number of days. 

If you have any specific weather forecasts or conditions that might affect drying, please share them for a more accurate estimate.

messages.content: Approximately how many days
messages.en: Approximately how many days
messages.standalone_question: How many days will it approximately take for the soil moisture to reach 100 kPa under the current conditions?

messages.content:
Since there is no historical evapotranspiration data available for your plot "pomo palace," I will estimate based on the current conditions and typical drying rates for sandy soil.

Given that your soil moisture is currently at 42 kPa and considering the weather conditions (temperature around 28°C, humidity between 50-60%, and no rainfall), sandy soil typically dries out at a rate of about 1-2 kPa per day under similar conditions.

### Estimation:
- **Current Soil Moisture:** 42 kPa
- **Target Soil Moisture:** 100 kPa
- **Difference:** 100 kPa - 42 kPa = 58 kPa

If we assume an average drying rate of 1.5 kPa per day:
- **Days to reach 100 kPa:** 58 kPa / 1.5 kPa per day ≈ 39 days

### Conclusion:
It may take approximately **39 days** for the soil moisture to reach 100 kPa under the current conditions. However, this is an estimate, and actual conditions may vary. Regular monitoring is recommended.

messages.content: Temp will rise from 4-5 degree in NXT 10-15 days and will remain constant between 35 to 17 degrees. How many days will it take to reach 100kpa
messages.en: Temp will rise from 4-5 degree in NXT 10-15 days and will remain constant between 35 to 17 degrees. How many days will it take to reach 100kpa
messages.standalone_question: How many days will it take for the soil moisture to reach 100 kPa if the temperature rises by 4-5 degrees in the next 10-15 days and remains constant between 17 to 35 degrees?

messages.content:
With the temperature expected to rise by 4-5 degrees in the next 10-15 days and remain constant between 17 to 35 degrees, the drying rate of the soil will likely increase due to higher temperatures, which can lead to increased evaporation.

### Estimation:
1. **Current Soil Moisture:** 42 kPa
2. **Target Soil Moisture:** 100 kPa
3. **Difference:** 100 kPa - 42 kPa = 58 kPa

### Drying Rate:
- Under normal conditions, the drying rate was estimated at about 1.5 kPa per day.
- With the temperature increase, we can expect the drying rate to increase to approximately 2-3 kPa per day.

### Calculation:
- If we assume an average drying rate of 2.5 kPa per day (considering the temperature rise):
  - **Days to reach 100 kPa:** 58 kPa / 2.5 kPa per day ≈ 23 days

### Conclusion:
It may take approximately **23 days** for the soil moisture to reach 100 kPa under the expected conditions. However, this is an estimate, and actual conditions may vary. Regular monitoring of soil moisture is recommended to adjust irrigation practices accordingly.

messages.content: What if my pomegranate plants doesn't reach the stress and I will take ethrel to defoliation, will my plants produce female flowers or not
messages.en: What if my pomegranate plants doesn't reach the stress and I will take ethrel to defoliation, will my plants produce female flowers or not
messages.standalone_question: If I use ethrel for defoliation on my pomegranate plants and they don't reach stress, will they still produce female flowers?

messages.content:
Using Ethrel for defoliation on your pomegranate plants can influence flower production. If the plants do not experience stress and you apply Ethrel, it may lead to premature leaf drop without the necessary stress signals that typically trigger the production of female flowers.

Pomegranate plants generally require a certain level of stress (like drought or temperature changes) to promote the formation of female flowers. If Ethrel is applied without the plants reaching that stress level, it could potentially reduce the chances of female flower development.

In summary, while Ethrel can aid in defoliation, it is essential to consider the overall health and stress levels of your plants to ensure optimal flower production. Monitoring the plants closely and applying Ethrel at the right time can help achieve the desired results.

Pomegranate plants generally require a certain level of stress (like drought or temperature changes) to promote the formation of female flowers. If Ethrel is applied without the plants reaching that stress level, it could potentially reduce the chances of female flower development.

In summary, while Ethrel can aid in defoliation, it is essential to consider the overall health and stress levels of your plants to ensure optimal flower production. Monitoring the plants closely and applying Ethrel at the right time can help achieve the desired results.

messages.en: Based on my data, how many days will my plants takes to get atleast 50% stress
messages.standalone_question: How many days will it take for my pomegranate plants to experience at least 50% stress based on my data?

messages.content:
To estimate how many days it will take for your pomegranate plants to experience at least 50% stress, we need to consider the current soil moisture level and the expected drying rate.

### Current Soil Moisture:
- **Current Soil Moisture:** 42 kPa

### Stress Level:
- **50% Stress Level:** This typically occurs when soil moisture reaches around 100 kPa for pomegranate plants.

### Difference:
- **Difference to Reach 50% Stress:** 100 kPa - 42 kPa = 58 kPa

### Estimated Drying Rate:
Given the expected temperature rise and conditions, let's assume a drying rate of approximately 2.5 kPa per day.

### Calculation:
- **Days to Reach 50% Stress:** 58 kPa / 2.5 kPa per day ≈ 23 days

### Conclusion:
It may take approximately **23 days** for your pomegranate plants to experience at least 50% stress under the current conditions. Regular monitoring of soil moisture is recommended to adjust your irrigation practices accordingly.

messages.content: Fertilzer
messages.en: Fertilzer
messages.standalone_question: What type of fertilizer should I use for my avocado crop?

messages.content:
For your "Avocado" crop, currently, no fertigation is needed. However, the next fertigation schedule will begin in **Growth Stage 2** starting from **December 9, 2025**. Here are the recommended fertilizers for that stage:

### Soil Application Method:
1. **Option 1:**
   - 10-26-26: 28.5 kg/acre
   - Urea: 15.5 kg/acre
   - Muriate of Potash: 2.5 kg/acre
   - Farmyard Manure: 5 kg/plant

2. **Option 2:**
   - 12-32-16: 23 kg/acre
   - Urea: 15.5 kg/acre
   - Muriate of Potash: 9 kg/acre
   - Farmyard Manure: 5 kg/plant

3. **Option 3:**
   - Urea: 21.5 kg/acre
   - 18-46-0 (Diammonium phosphate): 16.5 kg/acre
   - Muriate of Potash: 15 kg/acre
   - Farmyard Manure: 5 kg/plant

### Fertigation Method:
1. **Option 1:**
   - 12-61-0: 1 kg/acre
   - Urea: 1 kg/acre
   - Magnesium Sulphate: 1 kg/acre

2. **Option 2:**
   - 24-24-0: 2.5 kg/acre
   - Magnesium Sulphate: 1 kg/acre

3. **Option 3:**
   - Urea: 1.5 kg/acre
   - Phosphoric acid 80%: 770 gm/acre
   - Magnesium Sulphate: 1 kg/acre

**Note:** Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "अनुष्का प्लॉट 1" मध्ये, सध्या तुमचे पिक "गाजर" च्या "Beginning of Bloom" अवस्थेत आहे, जी 2025-11-18 पासून सुरू झाली आहे. 

सध्या (2025-11-25) तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3 kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1 kg/acre (हे इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.)

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 2, 2025-12-16 पासून):
1. **11-44-11** - 5.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (हे इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 kg/acre

कृपया या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करा.
messages.en:
In your "Anushka Plot 1", your crop is currently in the "Beginning of Bloom" stage of "Carrot", which started from 2025-11-18. 

Currently, (2025-11-25) you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3 kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1 kg/acre (This should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.)

### Next Fertigation Schedule (from Week 2, 2025-12-16):
1. **11-44-11** - 5.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (This should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after application of other fertilizers.)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 kg/acre

Please use fertilizers according to this schedule.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "anushka plot 1" madhye, sadhya tumche pick "gajar" chya "Beginning of Bloom" avasthet aahe, ji 2025-11-18 pasun suru jhali ahe. 

sadhya (2025-11-25) tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule (saptah 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3 kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1 kg/acre (hey itar khatanchya anuprayogapoorvee 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.)

### pudhil fertigation schedule (saptah 2, 2025-12-16 pasun):
1. **11-44-11** - 5.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (hey itar khatanchya anuprayoganantar 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 kg/acre

krupaya ya shedulanusar khatancha vapar kara.

messages.content:
तुमच्या "माणिक चमन" द्राक्षांच्या पिकासाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "शूट विकास" या टप्प्यात आहात, जो 2025-11-19 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. या टप्प्यात, तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फेरस सल्फेट**: 600 ग्रॅम/एकर
- **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट**: 600 ग्रॅम/एकर

> **टीप**: फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म-खतांचा एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावा, म्हणजेच 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलो.

### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
1. **11-44-11**: 3 किलो/एकर
2. **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 13 किलो/एकर
3. **साल्फेट ऑफ पॉटॅश**: 1.5 किलो/एकर

**किंवा**

1. **13-40-13**: 3 किलो/एकर
2. **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 12.5 किलो/एकर
3. **साल्फेट ऑफ पॉटॅश**: 1.5 किलो/एकर

**किंवा**

1. **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 15 किलो/एकर
2. **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल (80%)**: 2 किलो/एकर
3. **साल्फेट ऑफ पॉटॅश**: 2.5 किलो/एकर

### पुढील शेड्यूल:
तुमच्या पुढील आठवड्यात (2025-12-24 पासून) तुम्हाला फोलिअर पद्धतीने झिंक ऑक्साइड आणि गिब्बेरलिक आम्ल (GA3) वापरावे लागेल.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या आरोग्यासाठी योग्य खतांचा वापर करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
For your "Manik Chaman" grape crop, you are currently in the "shoot development" stage, which has started from 2025-11-19. During this step, you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Foliar Method:
- **Ferrous sulfate**: 600 g/acre
- **Manganese sulfate**: 600 g/acre

> **Note**: The concentration of micro-fertilizers in the foliar spray should not exceed 1%, i.e. 5 kg in 500 liters of water.

### Fertigation Method:
1. **11-44-11**: 3 kg/acre
2. **Calcium Nitrate**: 13 kg/acre
3. **Sulphate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**Or**

1. **13-40-13**: 3kg/acre
2. **Calcium Nitrate**: 12.5 kg/acre
3. **Sulphate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**Or**

1. **Calcium Nitrate**: 15kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid (80%)**: 2 kg/acre
3. **Sulphate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

### Next Schedule:
In your next week (from 2025-12-24), you will need to use zinc oxide and gibberellic acid (GA3) in the foliar method.

It is important to use the right fertilizers for the health of your crop.

tumachya "manik chaman" draksanchya pikasathi, sadhya tumhi "shoot vikas" ya tappyat ahat, joe 2025-11-19 pasun suru jhala aahe. ya tappyat, tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### foliar paddhatine:
- **ferrous sulphate**: 600 gram/acre
- **manganese sulphate**: 600 gram/acre

> **tip**: foliar spremadhye suksm-khatancha ekagrata 1% peksa jast nasava, mhanajech 500 litre panyat 5 kilo.

### fertigation paddhatine:
1. **11-44-11**: 3 kilo/acre
2. **calcium nitrate**: 13 kilo/acre
3. **salphet of potash**: 1.5 kilo/acre

**kinva**

1. **13-40-13**: 3 kilo/acre
2. **calcium nitrate**: 12.5 kilo/acre
3. **salphet of potash**: 1.5 kilo/acre

**kinva**

1. **calcium nitrate**: 15 kilo/acre
2. **phosphoric aml (80%)**: 2 kilo/acre
3. **salphet of potash**: 2.5 kilo/acre

### pudhil schedule:
tumachya pudhil athavadyat (2025-12-24 pasun) tumhala foliar paddhatine zinc oxide ani gibberlik aml (GA3) vaparave lagel.

tumachya pikachya aarogyasathi yogy khatancha vapar karane mahattvache aahe.

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (अनार) खत वापरण्याबाबत माहिती खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

1. **Pomo plot 2**:
   - सध्या तुमचे पीक "Stress" अवस्थेत आहे. 
   - फर्टिगेशन डेटा उपलब्ध नाही, त्यामुळे विशेष खताची शिफारस करता येत नाही.

2. **Pomo plot 3**:
   - तुमचे पीक "Growth stage 4" अवस्थेत आहे.
   - फर्टिगेशन डेटा मिळवण्यात अडचण आली आहे.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या अवस्थेनुसार, सामान्यतः अनार पिकांसाठी NPK (नायट्रोजन, फॉस्फरस, पोटॅशियम) मिश्रण वापरणे उपयुक्त ठरते. तुम्ही स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधून अधिक माहिती मिळवू शकता.
messages.en:
The information about using fertilizer for your crop (pomegranate) is as follows:

1. **Pomo plot 2**:
   - At present, your crop is in the "stress" stage. 
   - Fertigation data is not available, hence special fertilizer cannot be recommended.

2. **Pomo plot 3**:
   - Your crop is in the "Growth Stage 4" stage.
   - There is a problem in obtaining fertigation data.

Depending on the stage of your crop, it is generally helpful to use an NPK (Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium) mixture for pomegranate crops. You can get more information by contacting local agricultural experts.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikasathi (anar) khat vaparanyababat mahiti khalilapramane aahe:

1. **Pomo plot 2**:
   - sadhya tumache peak "Stress" avasthet aahe. 
   - fertigation data upalabdh nahi, tyamule vishes khatachi shipharas karata yet nahi.

2. **Pomo plot 3**:
   - tumache peak "Growth stage 4" avasthet aahe.
   - fertigation data milavanyat adachan ali aahe.

tumachya pikachya avasthenusar, samanyatah anaar pikansathi NPK (nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium) mishran vaparane upayukt tharate. tumhi sthanik krishi tajnanshi sampark sadhun adhik mahiti milavu shakata.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Banana plot 3" साठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Early vegetative growth" टप्प्यात आहात, जो 8 व्या आठवड्यात आहे. तुमच्या पिकासाठी खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### सध्याचा खत वापर:
1. **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
   - **11-44-11**: 4 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **Urea**: 4 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

   किंवा

   - **13-40-13**: 4 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **Urea**: 3.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

   किंवा

   - **Urea**: 5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 किग्रॅ/प्लांट (हे इतर खतांच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे लागू करावे)
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

### पुढील खत वापर:
- **"Grand growth" टप्प्यात (आठवडा 1)**, 4 डिसेंबर 2025 पासून:
   - **Urea**: 75 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **Muriate of Potash**: 146 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

तुमच्या पिकाच्या वाढीच्या टप्प्यानुसार हे खत वापरा.
messages.en:
For your "Banana plot 3", you are currently in the "Early Vegetative Growth" phase, which is in the 8th week. The following fertilizers should be used for your crop:

### Current Fertilizer Usage:
1. **Fertigation Method:**
   - **11-44-11**: 4 kg/plant
   - **Urea**: 4 kg/plant
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3 kg/plant

or

- **13-40-13**: 4 kg/plant
   - **Urea**: 3.5 kg/plant
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3 kg/plant

or

- **Urea**: 5 kg/plant
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kg/plant (this should be applied 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/plant

### Use the next fertilizer:
- **In the "Grand Growth" Phase (Week 1)**, from December 4, 2025:
   - **Urea**: 75 kg/plant
   - **Muriate of Potash**: 146 kg/plant

Use this fertilizer according to the growth stage of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Banana plot 3" sathi, sadhya tumhi "Early vegetative growth" tappyat aahat, joe 8 vya aathvadyat aahe. tumachya pikasathi khalil khatancha vapar karava:

### sadhyacha khat vapar:
1. **fertigation paddhatine:**
   - **11-44-11**: 4 kigra/plant
   - **Urea**: 4 kigra/plant
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3 kigra/plant

kinva

- **13-40-13**: 4 kigra/plant
   - **Urea**: 3.5 kigra/plant
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3 kigra/plant

kinva

- **Urea**: 5 kigra/plant
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kigra/plant (hey itar khatanchya aadhi 15-20 minite lagoo karave)
   - **White Muriate of Potash**: 3.5 kigra/plant

### pudhil khat vapar:
- **"Grand growth" tappyat (athavada 1)**, 4 december 2025 pasun:
   - **Urea**: 75 kigra/plant
   - **Muriate of Potash**: 146 kigra/plant

tumachya pikachya vadhichya tappyanusar hey khat vapara.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "dalimb plot" (डाळिंब प्लॉट) साठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Growth stage 3" (वाढीचा टप्पा 3) मध्ये आहात, जो 9 व्या आठवड्यात आहे. 

### सध्याचा खत वापर:
1. **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
   - **24-24-0**: 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Urea**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 680 ग्रॅम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर

### पुढील खत वापर:
तुमच्या पुढील "Growth stage 4" (वाढीचा टप्पा 4) साठी, 1 व्या आठवड्यात खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:
- **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:**
   - **Manganese Sulphate**: 400 ग्रॅम/एकर
   - **Zinc Sulphate**: 600 ग्रॅम/एकर
   - **Ferrous Sulphate**: 700 ग्रॅम/एकर (फोलिअर स्प्रे साठी 1% पेक्षा जास्त एकाग्रता वापरू नका)

- **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
   - **12-61-0**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Urea**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **24-24-0**: 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Urea**: 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 850 ग्रॅम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)

तुमच्या पिकाच्या वाढीच्या टप्प्यानुसार हे खत वापरा.
messages.en:
For your "Dalimb Plot", you are currently in "Growth Stage 3", which is in the 9th week. 

### Current Fertilizer Usage:
1. **Fertigation Method:**
   - **24-24-0**: 2 kg/acre
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 1 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 680 g/acre (to be applied separately 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers)
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 kg/acre

### Use the next fertilizer:
For your next "Growth Stage 4", use the following fertilizers in week 1:
- **Foliar Method:**
   - **Manganese Sulphate**: 400 g/acre
   - **Zinc Sulphate**: 600 g/acre
   - **Ferrous Sulphate**: 700 g/acre (do not use more than 1% concentration for foliar spray)

- **Fertigation Method:**
   - **12-61-0**: 1 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 1 kg/acre
   - **24-24-0**: 3 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 1.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 850 g/acre (to be applied separately 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers)

Use this fertilizer according to the growth stage of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "dalimb plot" (dalimb plot) sathi, sadhya tumhi "Growth stage 3" (vadhicha tappa 3) madhye aahat, jo 9 vya aathvadyat aahe. 

### sadhyacha khat vapar:
1. **fertigation paddhatine:**
   - **24-24-0**: 2 kilogram/acre
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 kilogram/acre
   - **Urea**: 1 kilogram/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 680 gram/acre (itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 kilogram/acre

### pudhil khat vapar:
tumachya pudhil "Growth stage 4" (vadhicha tappa 4) sathi, 1 vya aathvadyat khalil khatancha vapar karava:
- **follier paddhatine:**
   - **Manganese Sulphate**: 400 gram/acre
   - **Zinc Sulphate**: 600 gram/acre
   - **Ferrous Sulphate**: 700 gram/acre (follier spray sathi 1% peksha jast ekagrata vaparu naka)

- **fertigation paddhatine:**
   - **12-61-0**: 1 kilogram/acre
   - **Urea**: 1 kilogram/acre
   - **24-24-0**: 3 kilogram/acre
   - **Urea**: 1.5 kilograms/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 850 gram/acre (itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)

tumachya pikachya vadhichya tappyanusar hey khat vapara.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content: મને ખાતર અથવા પોષક તત્વો માટેની માહિતી મેળવવા માટે તમારા પાકના પ્લોટની વિગતોની જરૂર છે. કૃપા કરીને તમારા પાકના નામ અને પ્લોટનું નામ જણાવો, જેથી હું યોગ્ય માહિતી આપી શકું.
messages.en: I need the details of your crop plot to get information for fertilizer or nutrients. Please tell me the name of your crop and the name of the plot, so that I can give the correct information.
messages.content_transliterated: mane khatar athava poshak tatvo mateni mahiti melavava mate tamara pakana plotani vigatoni jarur che. krupa karine tamara pakana nam ane plotanun nam janavo, jethi hu yogy mahiti aapi saku.

initial_message: मागील आठवड्यात माझ्या पिकावर कोणते रोग किंवा कीड आली होती?

messages.content: मागील आठवड्यात माझ्या पिकावर कोणते रोग किंवा कीड आली होती?
messages.en: What disease or pest did my crop suffer last week?
messages.standalone_question: What diseases or pests affected my crop last week?
messages.content_transliterated: magil athavadyat mazya pikavar conte rog kinva kid ali hoti?

messages.content: माझ्या तपासणीनुसार, मागील आठवड्यात तुमच्या "Plot no 1" पिकावर कोणतेही रोग किंवा कीड संबंधित मेट्रिक्स उपलब्ध नाहीत. त्यामुळे, त्या काळात कोणतेही रोग किंवा कीड आढळलेले नाहीत असे दिसते.
messages.en: According to my investigation, there are no disease or pest related metrics available on your "Plot No 1" crop last week. Therefore, it seems that no diseases or pests were detected during that period.
messages.content_transliterated: mazya tapasaninusar, magil athavadyat tumachya "Plot no 1" pikavar konatehi rog kinva kid sambandhit metrics upalabdh nahit. tyamule, tya kalat konatehi rog kinva kid adhalalele nahit ase disate.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, હાલ કોઈ ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર નથી. પરંતુ આગામી સપ્તાહમાં, જ્યારે પાક "વેગેટેટિવ ગ્રોથ" તબક્કામાં જશે, ત્યારે નીચે મુજબના ખાતરોની જરૂર પડશે:

1. **પ્રથમ સપ્તાહ (1 દિવસ)**:
   - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ**: 1 લિટર/એકર
   - નોંધ: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

2. **પ્રથમ સપ્તાહ (4 દિવસ)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **યુરિયા**: 7 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - અથવા
   - **24-24-0**: 16 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - અથવા
   - **યુરિયા**: 8.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%**: 4.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - નોંધ: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

આ ખાતરો 2025-12-02 થી લાગુ કરવા માટે તૈયાર રહો.
messages.en:
For your crop, there is no need to apply any fertilizer at the moment. But in the next week, when the crop will go into the "negative growth" phase, the following fertilizers will be required:

1. **First week (1 day)**:
   - **Humic Acid**: 1 liter/acre
   - Note: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

2. **First Week (4 days)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 7 kg/acre
   -or
   - **24-24-0**: 16 kg/acre
   -or
   - **Urea**: 8.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 4.5 kg/acre
   - Note: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

Be prepared to apply these fertilizers from 2025-12-02.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, hal koi khatar apavani jarur nathi. parantu agami saptahaman, jyaare pak "vegetative growth" tabakkaman jashe, tyare nice mujabana khataroni jarur padse:

1. **pratham saptah (1 divas)**:
   - **humic acid**: 1 litre/acre
   - nondh: phosphoric acid any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

2. **pratham saptah (4 divas)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 kilogram/acre
   - **yuriya**: 7 kilogram/acre
   - athava
   - **24-24-0**: 16 kilogram/acre
   - athava
   - **yuriya**: 8.5 kilogram/acre
   - **phosphoric acid 80%**: 4.5 kilogram/acre
   - nondh: phosphoric acid any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

a khataro 2025-12-02 thi lagu karva mate taiyar raho.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content: तुमच्या "साखर कॅन" पिकाला सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. सध्या मातीतील आर्द्रता 82% आहे, जी 55% च्या आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या वर आहे. त्यामुळे पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही.
messages.en: Your "sugar can" crop doesn't need to be watered right now. The current soil moisture content is 82%, which is above the ideal moisture content of 55%. Therefore, it is not necessary to give water.
messages.content_transliterated: tumachya "sakhar can" pikala sadhya pani denyachi avashyakata nahi. sadhya matitil ardrata 82% aahe, g 55% chya adarsh ardratechya var aahe. tyamule pani dene avashyak nahi.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सुरुवात बूम)
- **सप्ताह 1** (सुरुवात तारीख: 23 नोव्हेंबर 2025)
  - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने वापरायचे खत:**
    1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे)

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल
- **सप्ताह 2** (सुरुवात तारीख: 21 डिसेंबर 2025)
  - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने वापरायचे खत:**
    1. **11-44-11** - 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    2. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    3. **Calcium nitrate** - 4 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे)

कृपया या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करा.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers should be used for your crop (grapes):

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Beginning Boom)
- **Week 1** (Start Date: 23 November 2025)
  - **Fertilizer to be used by fertigation method:**
    1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kg/acre
    2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kg/acre (to be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers)

### Next Fertigation Schedule
- **Week 2** (Start Date: December 21, 2025)
  - **Fertilizer to be used by fertigation method:**
    1. **11-44-11** - 5.5kg/acre
    2. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/acre
    3. **Calcium nitrate** - 4 kg/acre (to be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after use of other fertilizers)

Please use fertilizers according to this schedule.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikasathi (drakshe) khalil khatancha vapar karava:

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule (suruvat boom)
- **saptah 1** (suruvat tarikh: 23 novehember 2025)
  - **fertigation paddhatine vaparayche khat:**
    1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kilogram/acre
    2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kilograms/acre (itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave)

### pudhil fertigation schedule
- **saptah 2** (suruvat tarikh: 21 december 2025)
  - **fertigation paddhatine vaparayche khat:**
    1. **11-44-11** - 5.5 kilogram/acre
    2. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kilogram/acre
    3. **Calcium nitrate** - 4 kilogram/acre (itar khatanchya vaparanantar 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave)

krupaya ya shedulanusar khatancha vapar kara.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकाला पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

### **पिकांची स्थिती:**
1. **मनिकचमन प्लॉट:**
   - **मातीची आर्द्रता:** 100% (आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त)
   - **आवश्यक आर्द्रता:** 60%
   - **पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.**

2. **सुपर प्लॉट:**
   - **मातीची आर्द्रता:** 93% (आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त)
   - **आवश्यक आर्द्रता:** 60%
   - **पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.**

### **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:**
- **मनिकचमन प्लॉट:**
  - **सध्याची अवस्था:** फळ सेट (Fruit Set)
  - **फर्टिगेशन:** 
    - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:** 
      - **फेरस सल्फेट:** 600 ग्रॅम/एकर
      - **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट:** 600 ग्रॅम/एकर
    - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:** 
      - **11-44-11:** 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
      - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट:** 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
      - **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश:** 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
      - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

- **सुपर प्लॉट:**
  - **सध्याची अवस्था:** शूट विकास (Shoot Development)
  - **फर्टिगेशन:** 
    - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:** 
      - **सोल्यूबोर:** 300 ग्रॅम/एकर
      - **गिब्बेरलिक ऍसिड (GA3):** 15 पीपीएम/प्लांट

### **कृषी क्रियाकलाप:**
- आज कोणतेही कृषी क्रियाकलाप नाहीत.

जर तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असेल तर कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
Your crop does not need to be watered. 

### **Condition of Crops:**
1. **Manichaman Plot:**
   - **Soil moisture:** 100% (more than required)
   - **Required humidity:** 60%
   - **No watering required.**

2. **Super Plot:**
   - **Soil moisture:** 93% (more than required)
   - **Required humidity:** 60%
   - **No watering required.**

### **Fertigation Schedule:**
- **Manichaman Plot:**
  - **Current Status:** Fruit Set
  - **Fertigation:** 
    - **Foliar Method:** 
      - **Ferrous sulfate:** 600 g/acre
      - **Manganese sulfate:** 600 g/acre
    - **Fertigation Method:** 
      - **11-44-11:** 6.5 kg/acre
      - **Calcium Nitrate:** 3 kg/acre
      - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
      - **Magnesium Sulfate:** 1.5 kg/acre

- **Super Plot:**
  - **Current Status:** Shoot Development
  - **Fertigation:** 
    - **Foliar Method:** 
      - **Solubor:** 300 g/acre
      - **Gibberellic acid (GA3):** 15 ppm/plant

### **Agricultural Activities:**
- There are no agricultural activities today.

If you would like any more information, please let us know!
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikala pani denyachi avashyakata nahi. 

### **pikanchi sthiti:**
1. **manikachaman plot:**
   - **matichi ardrata:** 100% (avashyakatepeksa jast)
   - **avashyak ardrata:** 60%
   - **pani denyachi avashyakata nahi.**

2. **super plot:**
   - **matichi ardrata:** 93% (avashyakatepeksa jast)
   - **avashyak ardrata:** 60%
   - **pani denyachi avashyakata nahi.**

### **fertigation schedule:**
- **manikachaman plot:**
  - **sadhyachi avastha:** phal set (Fruit Set)
  - **fertigation:** 
    - **foliar paddhatine:** 
      - **ferrous sulphate:** 600 gram/acre
      - **manganese sulphate:** 600 gram/acre
    - **fertigation paddhatine:** 
      - **11-44-11:** 6.5 kilogram/acre
      - **calcium nitrate:** 3 kilogram/acre
      - **salphet of potash:** 3.5 kilogram/acre
      - **magnesium sulphate:** 1.5 kilograms/acre

- **super plot:**
  - **sadhyachi avastha:** shoot vikas (Shoot Development)
  - **fertigation:** 
    - **foliar paddhatine:** 
      - **solubor:** 300 gram/acre
      - **gibberlik esid (GA3):** 15 ppm/plant

### **krishi kriyakalap:**
- aaj konatehi krishi kriyakalap nahit.

jar tumhala anakhi kahi mahiti havi asel tar kripaya sanga!

initial_message: क्या मुझे अपनी फसल को पानी देना चाहिए?

messages.content: क्या मुझे अपनी फसल को पानी देना चाहिए?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: kya mujhe apni fasal ko pani dena chahiye?

messages.content:
आपको अपनी फसल "margad" को पानी देना चाहिए। 

वर्तमान मिट्टी की नमी इस प्रकार है:
- मिट्टी की नमी 1: 26 kPa (सूखी)
- मिट्टी की नमी 2: 21 kPa (सूखी)

इष्टतम मिट्टी की नमी 18 kPa है। चूंकि आपकी मिट्टी की नमी इष्टतम स्तर से ऊपर है, इसलिए पानी देना उचित है।
messages.en:
You should water your crop "Margad". 

The current soil moisture is as follows:
- Soil moisture 1: 26 kPa (dry)
- Soil moisture 2: 21 kPa (dry)

The optimum soil moisture is 18 kPa. Since your soil moisture is above the optimal level, watering is advisable.
messages.content_transliterated:
aapko apni fasal "margad" ko pani dena chahiye 

vartaman mitti ki nami is prakar hai:
- mitti ki nami 1: 26 kPa (sukhi)
- mitti ki nami 2: 21 kPa (sukhi)

ishtatam mitti ki nami 18 kPa hai chunki aapki mitti ki nami ishtatam star se ooper hai, isliye paani dena uchit hai

messages.standalone_question: What should be done for broad mites in capsicum (Shimla mirch)?

messages.content:
For your Capsicum crop in the plot "Rahul Nagar Gaddukhedi," here are the details regarding Broad Mites:

### Spray Schedule:
1. **Today (November 25, 2025)**:
   - **Purpose**: Broad Mites
   - **Application Mode**: Foliar
   - **Recommended Products**:
     - **Spiromesifen 240 SC**: 1 mL
     - **Fenazaquin 10% EC**: 1 mL
     - **Cyenopyrafen 30 SC**: 0.6 mL

### Previous Spray Recommendations:
- **November 14, 2025**: Broad Mites
- **November 16, 2025**: Aphids, Thrips, Whitefly
- **November 20, 2025**: Fruit Borer

### Spray Conditions:
- **Ideal Conditions** for spraying are expected from **November 25, 2025, 22:30** onwards, continuing through the night and into the next day. The conditions are favorable with no rainfall expected.

Please ensure to follow the recommended spray schedule and conditions for effective pest control. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆಗಾಗಿ ಯಾವ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರವನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬೇಕು?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: nanna belegagi yava rasagobbaravannu balasabeku?

messages.content:
ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆ (ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿ)ಗಾಗಿ, ಈ ವಾರ (2025-ನವೆಂಬರ್-25) ನೀವು "ಶೂಟ್ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ" ಹಂತದಲ್ಲಿ ಇದ್ದೀರಿ. ಈ ಹಂತದಲ್ಲಿ, ನೀವು ಕೆಳಗಿನ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು:

### ಫೋಲಿಯರ್ ವಿಧಾನದಲ್ಲಿ:
- **Solubor**: 300 gm/acre
- **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant

### ಮುಂದಿನ ಹಂತ (2025-ಡಿಸೆಂಬರ್-6 ರಿಂದ):
"ಬ್ಲೂಮ್ ಪ್ರಾರಂಭ" ಹಂತದಲ್ಲಿ, ನೀವು ಈ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು:
- **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre (ಇತರ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವ ಮೊದಲು 15-20 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕವಾಗಿ ಬಳಸಬೇಕು)

ಅಥವಾ
- **0-60-20**: 4.5 kg/acre

ಅಥವಾ
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

ಈ ಮಾಹಿತಿಯನ್ನು ಬಳಸಿಕೊಂಡು, ನೀವು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗಳಿಗೆ ಸೂಕ್ತವಾದ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರವನ್ನು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡಬಹುದು.
messages.en:
For your crop (grapes), this week (2025-Nov-25) you are in the "shoot development" phase. At this point, you can use the following fertilizers:

### In foliar method:
- **Solubor**: 300 gm/acre
- **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant

### Next step (from 6th Dec-2025):
At the "Bloom Start" stage, you can use these fertilizers:
- **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre (should be used separately for 15-20 minutes before using other fertilizers)

or
- **0-60-20**: 4.5 kg/acre

or
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

Using this information, you can choose the right fertilizer for your crops.
messages.content_transliterated:
nimma bele (drakshi)gagi, e vara (2025-november-25) neevu "shoot abhivriddhi" hamtadalli iddiri. e hamtadalli, neevu kelagina rasagobbaragalannu balasabahudu:

### folier vidhanadalli:
- **Solubor**: 300 gm/acre
- **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant

### mundina hanta (2025-december-6 rind):
"bloom prarambha" hamtadalli, neevu e rasagobbaragalannu balasabahudu:
- **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre (itar rasagobbaragalannu balasuva modalu 15-20 nimishagal call pratyekavagi balasabeku)

athava
- **0-60-20**: 4.5 kg/acre

athava
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

e mahitiannu balasikondu, neevu nimma belegalige suktavada rasagobbaravannu ayke madabahudu.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "गव्हाचे" पिकासाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "बेरी विकास" टप्प्यात आहात, जो 2025-11-23 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. या टप्प्यात, तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
1. **Gibberallic acid (GA3)**: 20 ppm/प्लांट
2. **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/प्लांट
3. **Zinc Oxide**: 200 gm/एकर

### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
1. **11-44-11**: 6.5 kg/एकर
2. **Calcium nitrate**: 6.5 kg/एकर
3. **Sulfate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/एकर
4. **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1.5 kg/एकर

तुम्ही या खतांचा वापर करून तुमच्या पिकाची योग्य वाढ सुनिश्चित करू शकता. पुढील आठवड्यात (2026-01-18 पासून) तुम्हाला काही बदल असलेले खतांचे प्रमाण वापरावे लागेल.
messages.en:
For your "wheat" crop, you are currently in the "berry development" phase, which has started from 2025-11-23. During this step, you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Foliar Method:
1. **Gibberallic acid (GA3)**: 20 ppm/plant
2. **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/plant
3. **Zinc Oxide**: 200 gm/acre

### Fertigation Method:
1. **11-44-11**: 6.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate**: 6.5 kg/acre
3. **Sulfate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/acre
4. **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1.5 kg/acre

You can ensure proper growth of your crop by using these fertilizers. Next week (from 2026-01-18) you will have to use some modified fertilizer ratios.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "gavhache" pikasathi, sadhya tumhi "berry vikas" tappyat aahat, joe 2025-11-23 pasun suru jhala aahe. ya tappyat, tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### follier paddhatine:
1. **Gibberallic acid (GA3)**: 20 ppm/plant
2. **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/plant
3. **Zinc Oxide**: 200 gm/acre

### fertigation paddhatine:
1. **11-44-11**: 6.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate**: 6.5 kg/acre
3. **Sulfate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/acre
4. **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1.5 kg/acre

tumhi ya khatancha vapar karun tumachya picacci yogya vadh sunishchit karu shakta. pudhil aathvadyat (2026-01-18 pasun) tumhala kahi badal aslele khatanche praman vaparave lagel.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ મુજબ, "Growth stage 2" (વર્ષ 9) માટે નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરવો જોઈએ:

### હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન:
1. **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર વિતરણ (ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ):**
   - **24-24-0**: 2.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

   અથવા

   - **Urea**: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 680 ગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

   > **નોંધ:** ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોના ઉપયોગ કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન (Growth stage 3):
- **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર વિતરણ (માટીમાં લાગુ કરવાની પદ્ધતિ):**
   - **10-26-26**: 27.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Urea**: 19 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

   અથવા

   - **12-32-16**: 22.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Urea**: 19.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Muriate of Potash**: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

   > આ ફર્ટિગેશન "Growth stage 3" માટે 2026-02-03 થી શરૂ થશે.

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે તમારા પાક માટે યોગ્ય ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
For your crop, as per the current fertigation schedule, the following fertilizers should be used for "Growth stage 2" (Year 9):

### Current Fertigation:
1. **Fertilizer distribution (fertigation method):**
   - **24-24-0**: 2.5 kg/acre
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 kg/acre

or

- **Urea**: 1.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 680 g/acre
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 1 kg/acre

> **Note:** Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before using other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation (Growth Stage 3):
- **Fertilizer distribution (method of soil application):**
   - **10-26-26**: 27.5 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 19 kg/acre

or

- **12-32-16**: 22.5 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 19.5 kg/acre
   - **Muriate of Potash**: 6 kg/acre

> This fertigation for "Growth Stage 3" will start from 2026-02-03.

Using this information, you can use the right fertilizer for your crop.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content: तुमच्या "साखरेच्या कांड्या" पिकाला पाणी देण्याची स्थिती अशी आहे की, सध्याचे क्षेत्र डेटा अद्ययावत नाही. कारण, सर्वात अलीकडील डेटा 4 तासांपूर्वी प्राप्त झाला होता. संभाव्य कारणे: नेटवर्क समस्या, उपकरण समस्या, कमी बॅटरी, किंवा रिचार्ज योजना संपली आहे. तुम्हाला या समस्येचे निराकरण हवे असल्यास, समर्थन तिकीट उघडू शकता.
messages.en: The situation of watering your "sugar stick" crop is such that the current field data is not up to date. Because, the most recent data was received 4 hours ago. Possible causes: network problems, equipment problems, low battery, or the recharge plan is dead. If you want a solution to this issue, you can open a support ticket.
messages.content_transliterated: tumachya "sakharechya kandya" pikala pani denyachi sthiti ashi aahe key, sadhyache ksetr data adyayavat nahi. karan, sarvat alikadil data 4 tasampurvi prapt jhala hota. sambhavy karane: network samasya, upakaran samasya, kami battery, kinva recharge yojana sampali aahe. tumhala ya samasyeche nirakaran have asalyas, samarthan tikit ughadu shakata.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकांसाठी पाण्याची स्थिती खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

1. **पेरू प्लॉट (peru plot पेऱू)**:
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 61% आणि 81%
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 70%
   - **पाणी देणे आवश्यक आहे**, कारण मातीची आर्द्रता आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या खाली आहे.

2. **अनार प्लॉट (pomegranate डाळिंब)**:
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 83% आणि 85%
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 55%
   - **पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही**, कारण मातीची आर्द्रता आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या वर आहे.

तुम्ही पेरू प्लॉटसाठी पाणी देऊ शकता, परंतु अनार प्लॉटसाठी पाण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.
messages.en:
The water status for your crops is as follows:

1. **Peru Plot**:
   - Soil moisture: 61% and 81%
   - Ideal humidity: 70%
   - **Watering is required**, as soil moisture is below ideal humidity.

2. **Pomegranate Pomegranate**:
   - Soil Moisture: 83% and 85%
   - Ideal humidity: 55%
   - **Watering is not necessary**, as soil moisture is above ideal humidity.

You can provide water for a guava plot, but no water is required for a pomegranate plot.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikansathi panyachi sthiti khalilapramane aahe:

1. **peru plot (peru plot peru)**:
   - matichi ardrata: 61% ani 81%
   - adarsh ardrata: 70%
   - **pani dene avashyak aahe**, karan matichi ardrata adarsh ardratechya khali aahe.

2. **anaar plot (pomegranate dalimb)**:
   - matichi ardrata: 83% ani 85%
   - adarsh ardrata: 55%
   - **pani dene avashyak nahi**, karan matichi ardrata adarsh ardratechya var aahe.

tumhi peru plotsathi pani deu shakata, parantu anaar plotsathi panyachi avashyakata nahi.

messages.content: पेरु प्लॉटला आत्ता पाणी दिले तर चालेल का
messages.en: Is it okay to give water to the guava plot now?
messages.standalone_question: Is it okay to water the guava plot right now?
messages.content_transliterated: peru plotala atta pani dile tar chalel ka

messages.content: होय, पेरू प्लॉटला (peru plot पेऱू) आत्ता पाणी दिले तर चालेल. मातीची आर्द्रता 61% आणि 81% आहे, जी आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या 70% च्या खाली आहे. त्यामुळे तुम्ही पाणी देऊ शकता.
messages.en: Yes, it is okay to give water to the Peru plot now. Soil moisture is 61% and 81%, which are below 70% of the ideal humidity. So you can give water.
messages.content_transliterated: hoy, peru plotala (peru plot peru) atta pani dile tar chalel. matichi ardrata 61% ani 81% aahe, g adarsh ardratechya 70% chya khali aahe. tyamule tumhi pani deu shakata.
